latex:
In $2005$ Tycoon Tammy invested $\$100$ for two years. During the the first year\\
her investment suffered a $15\%$ loss, but during the second year the remaining\\
investment showed a $20\%$ gain. Over the two-year period, what was the change\\
in Tammy's investment?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\  5\%\text{ loss}\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 2\%\text{ loss}\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 1\%\text{ gain}\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 2\% \text{ gain} \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\  5\%\text{ gain}$
